date.description: The date on which the data is collected or reported.

channel_id.description: The unique identifier for the channel associated with the playlist data.

playlist_id.description: The unique identifier for the playlist for which the traffic source data is recorded.

video_id.description: The unique identifier for the videos in the playlist that generated the views.

live_or_on_demand.description: Indicates whether the views are from live-streamed or on-demand videos in the playlist.

subscribed_status.description: Indicates whether the viewer was subscribed to the channel when interacting with the playlist.

country_code.description: The country code representing the location of the viewers who interacted with the playlist.

traffic_source_type.description: The type of traffic source through which the views were generated (e.g., YouTube search, external etc.).

traffic_source_detail.description: Additional details about the traffic source from which the views originated.

views.description: The total number of views received by the videos in the playlist.

watch_time_minutes.description: The total watch time, in minutes, accumulated by viewers for the videos in the playlist.

average_view_duration_seconds.description: The average duration, in seconds, for which viewers watched the videos in the playlist.

playlist_starts.description: The total number of times the playlist was started by viewers.

playlist_saves_added.description: The number of times the playlist was added to a user's saved playlists.

playlist_saves_removed.description: The number of times the playlist was removed from a user's saved playlists.
